<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/logicalview/lvsplitcontext/#abbd84c64887e4fc08cf9e7d5fe9d14a9"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/logicalview/lvsplitcontext/#abbd84c64887e4fc08cf9e7d5fe9d14a9">LVSplitContext::createSplitFolder</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Where) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the filename for given object.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/logicalview/lvreader/#a6646a556e7732c3d1037047b4bb4ee7e"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/logicalview/lvreader/#a9cfe13a99c14005ccbf4e6b653713f0e">LVReader::getFilename</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/logicalview/lvobject">LVObject</a> &#42;Object, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Index)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: The current CodeView Reader implementation does not have support</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for multiple compile units. Until we have a proper offset calculation,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// check only in the current compile unit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CompileUnits.size()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The Reader is the module that creates the logical view using the debug</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// information contained in the binary file specified in the command line.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is the main entry point for the Reader and performs the following</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// steps:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Process any patterns collected from the &#39;--select&#39; options.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - For each compile unit in the debug information:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#42; Create the logical elements (scopes, symbols, types, lines).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#42; Collect debug ranges and debug locations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#42; Move the collected logical lines to their associated scopes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Once all the compile units have been processed, traverse the scopes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   tree in order to:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#42; Calculate symbol coverage.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#42; Detect invalid ranges and locations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#42; &quot;resolve&quot; the logical elements. During this pass, the names and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      file information are updated, to reflect any dependency with other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     logical elements.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/logicalview/lvreader/#a8a15ec2eff468d1dc1137a8a8f20f525"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/logicalview/lvreader/#a8a15ec2eff468d1dc1137a8a8f20f525">LVReader::doLoad</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set current Reader instance.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/logicalview/lvreader/#ab170f24e5d76fee6ae66e469f43564f3">setInstance</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Before any scopes creation, process any pattern specified by the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// --select and --select-offsets options.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/logicalview/#a49e9684d6b3ce0b3b3744a864c3212e6">patterns</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/logicalview/lvpatterns/#a0a8ef488029bd1208eb4fc49054c7e20">addGenericPatterns</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/logicalview/#adc3278484dd140d018661381153aaf8d">options</a>().<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuregbankselect-cpp/#a09bc27545df3b02401428427d0b5ce6f">Select</a>.Generic);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/logicalview/#a49e9684d6b3ce0b3b3744a864c3212e6">patterns</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/logicalview/lvpatterns/#abf4651941d4b3e69dc692697901596b6">addOffsetPatterns</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/logicalview/#adc3278484dd140d018661381153aaf8d">options</a>().<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuregbankselect-cpp/#a09bc27545df3b02401428427d0b5ce6f">Select</a>.Offsets);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add any specific element printing requests based on the element kind.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/logicalview/#a49e9684d6b3ce0b3b3744a864c3212e6">patterns</a>().addRequest(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/logicalview/#adc3278484dd140d018661381153aaf8d">options</a>().<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuregbankselect-cpp/#a09bc27545df3b02401428427d0b5ce6f">Select</a>.Elements);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/logicalview/#a49e9684d6b3ce0b3b3744a864c3212e6">patterns</a>().addRequest(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/logicalview/#adc3278484dd140d018661381153aaf8d">options</a>().<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuregbankselect-cpp/#a09bc27545df3b02401428427d0b5ce6f">Select</a>.Lines);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/logicalview/#a49e9684d6b3ce0b3b3744a864c3212e6">patterns</a>().addRequest(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/logicalview/#adc3278484dd140d018661381153aaf8d">options</a>().<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuregbankselect-cpp/#a09bc27545df3b02401428427d0b5ce6f">Select</a>.Scopes);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/logicalview/#a49e9684d6b3ce0b3b3744a864c3212e6">patterns</a>().addRequest(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/logicalview/#adc3278484dd140d018661381153aaf8d">options</a>().<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuregbankselect-cpp/#a09bc27545df3b02401428427d0b5ce6f">Select</a>.Symbols);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/logicalview/#a49e9684d6b3ce0b3b3744a864c3212e6">patterns</a>().addRequest(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/logicalview/#adc3278484dd140d018661381153aaf8d">options</a>().<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuregbankselect-cpp/#a09bc27545df3b02401428427d0b5ce6f">Select</a>.Types);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Once we have processed the requests for any particular kind of elements,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we need to update the report options, in order to have a default value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/logicalview/#a49e9684d6b3ce0b3b3744a864c3212e6">patterns</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/logicalview/lvpatterns/#aa9a49f88eede80e9d9c90a692fb398d5">updateReportOptions</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Delegate the scope tree creation to the specific reader.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> Err = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/logicalview/lvreader/#af75cb2856d2563990ed489c38b63a5c3">createScopes</a>())</span></CodeLine>
